feed.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin core 0.11.0 release candidate 1 available

entry.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin core 0.11.0 release candidate 1 available
entry.summary: Wladimir has uploaded a new release of Bitcoin Core 0.11.0rc1 executables on https://bitcoin.org/bin/bitcoin-core-0.11.0/test/. The source code for the same can be found in the source tarball or in git under the tag 'v0.11.0rc1'. Preliminary release notes are available at https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/0.11/doc/release-notes.md. Wladimir expressed his gratitude to everyone who participated in development or the gitian build process. This release is expected to bring further improvements and enhancements to the Bitcoin network. It is important for Bitcoin users to stay updated with the latest releases to ensure optimal performance and security.
